message: I'm offering a fair deal, Bob. Let's get this done quickly!
I'm not greedy, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either!
Let's be reasonable, Bob. We can both get a good share if we compromise.  This is a 50/50 split, fair and simple.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
Bob, I'm getting tired of this back-and-forth.  Let's be pragmatic.  This offer is a good compromise - we both get a decent amount.  What do you say?
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a decent share.
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm making one last offer.  This is the best I can do. If you reject it, we're both going to lose a lot.
You're making a mistake, Alice. I'm going to take what's mine.
